text: Ryan M. North (born October 20, 1980) is a Canadian writer. He is the author of the comic strip Dinosaur Comics, as well as Whispered Apologies and several other projects. He is also the programmer of ohnorobot, a web comic search engine. Ryan North is also a member of The Ryans, a group dedicated to being called Ryan and making comics. ==Other websites== * Dinosaur Comics * Whispered Apologies Category:Writers from Ontario Category:Comics writers Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ottawa
title: Ryan North
